sentences.text: Moon Sung-wook (Korean: 문승욱, born 1965) is a South Korean government official currently serving as Minister of Trade, Industry and Energy under President Moon Jae-in from May 2021.

links.text: Minister of Trade, Industry and Energy
links.page: Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy (South Korea)

sentences.text: He previously served as the 2nd Deputy Minister for Government Policy Coordination from 2020 to 2021, the Deputy Governor of South Gyeongsang from 2018 to 2020, and the Deputy Minister of Defence Acquisition Programme Administration from 2016 to 2017.

links.text: 2nd Deputy Minister for Government Policy Coordination
Deputy Minister of Defence Acquisition Programme Administration

list: Deputy Governor for Western South Gyeongsang until 1 August 2018.

Yonsei University
Seoul National University
Harvard University

references.title: 문 대통령, 문승욱 산업부 장관 임명안 재가…오늘 임기 시작

sentences.text: His career has begun after qualifying for the Public Administration Examination in 1989.
He used to work together with Kim Kyoung-soo at the Blue House under the former President Roh Moo-hyun.
He served various positions at the Ministry of Knowledge Economy, and then the Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy from 2008 to 2018.

links.text: Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy
links.page: Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy (South Korea)

sentences.text: Moon was appointed the Deputy Minister of Defence Acquisition Programme Administration during the Park Geun-hye government in February 2016.

links.text: Deputy Minister of Defence Acquisition Programme Administration

sentences.text: He remained at the position after Moon Jae-in was elected the President in 2017, until he was replaced by Yoo Jung-yeol in October 2017.
After Kim Kyoung-soo was elected the Governor of South Gyeongsang in the 2018 local elections, Moon was nominated the Deputy Governor for Economy in July 2018.
He served for about 2 years until he was appointed the 2nd Deputy Minister for Government Policy Coordination on 8 May 2020.

links.text: 2nd Deputy Minister for Government Policy Coordination

sentences.text: On 16 April 2021, Moon was nominated the new Minister of Trade, Industry and Energy.

references.title: 문승욱 산업부 장관 내정자 "선도형 경제 도약에 최선"(상보)
경남도 경제부지사에 문승욱 산자부 실장 내정
[프로필] 문승욱 산업부 장관 후보자…"정책·실물 전문성 겸비한 산업통"

sentences.text: Moon attended Sungdong High School before entering to Yonsei University to study Bachelor in Economics.
He is also graduated from Master in Public Administration at Seoul National University and Harvard University.
